column5: As the title states, I would like to get my wife's iPhone 6 unlocked, suggestions welcome! Thanks in advance!
Take it up to Pacific Mall. There are lots of stores that will do it.  Compare prices before deciding on one. Good luck.
A friend used this, worked perfectly no problems!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0GCiPAsVq90
I thought not even the FBI can do that. Big issue in the US now.
no that's two different things unlock only means you're not tied to the one provider
What does getting it unlocked mean for us less than up on the know?

What does getting it unlocked mean for us less than up on the know?  It means getting it unlocked from a specific carrier. So when you get a phone and a plan from Bell, unless you buy the phone unlocked (much more expensive, you have to purchase the phone outright rather than having the price included as part of the plan) it will only work with one of Bell's SIM cards. When you have an unlocked phone, you can use just about any SIM card in it anywhere in the world.

Iphone is one of the most expensive to unlock. My sister gave me one that was locked to Rogers and it was cheapest for her to unlock it through them. It cost $50 that way, but would have cost around $100 if I brought it somewhere else.

As the title states, I would like to get my wife's iPhone 6 unlocked, suggestions welcome! Thanks in advance! Just stop at the corner of Markham and Eglington, see anyone shady standing around, they can probably do it.  Problem is you might not get it back.
